attributes.action: Create a modern, clean and safe transportation system as a genuine alternative to road pricing to reduce congestion and help the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to see as much time and effort which has gone into road pricing going into our transportation system, why is it so difficult to make buses and trains run on time, be frequent, clean, safe and cost effective when so many other countries have this already?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
